content.title: Hackathon Announcement
content.text: The getlinked tech hackathon 1.0 is formally announced to the general public and teams begin to get ready to register

content.title: Teams Registration begins
content.text: Interested teams can now show their interest in the getlinked tech hackathon 1.0 2023 by proceeding to register

content.title: Teams Registration ends
content.text: Interested Participants are no longer Allowed to register

content.title: Announcement of the accepted teams and ideas
content.text: All teams whom idea has been accepted into getlinked tech hackathon 1.0 2023 are formally announced

content.title: Getlinked Hackathon 1.0 Offically Begins
content.text: Accepted teams can now proceed to build their ground breaking skill driven solutions

content.title: Demo Day
content.text: Teams get the opportunity to pitch their projects to judges. The winner of the hackathon will also be announced on this day
